```css
// Property: tlsVersion
// Description: Sets the TLS version to use for handshakes.
// Component(s): Ti.Network.HTTPClient
'.tls-version-network-1-0': { tlsVersion: Ti.Network.TLS_VERSION_1_0 }
'.tls-version-network-1': { tlsVersion: Ti.Network.TLS_VERSION_1_1 }
'.tls-version-network-1-2': { tlsVersion: Ti.Network.TLS_VERSION_1_2 }
'.tls-version-network-1-3': { tlsVersion: Ti.Network.TLS_VERSION_1_3 }
```
